ing: 1/2 cup sweet pickles, halved and sliced
1/4 cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle WhipÂ®), or to taste
des: "Very easy salad. Can have all the ingredients in pantry for a spontaneous get-together. Peas combine with pickles and peanuts for a refreshing summer salad."
ins: Lightly mix peas, sweet pickles, peanuts, and creamy salad dressing in a bowl. Chill until cold, about 45 minutes.
